Uses of Class
org.jamwiki.utils.Pagination

  • Packages that use Pagination 
    Package Description
    org.jamwiki.db
    Provides classes needed for all database interaction.
    org.jamwiki.servlets
    Provides classes that work with the Spring Framework to process HTTP requests and to then redirect appropriately.
    org.jamwiki.utils
    Provides various general utility classes including encryption, caching, and logging.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> List<T> Pagination.retrievePaginatedSubset(Pagination pagination, Collection<T> items)
      Utility method for retrieving a list that is a subset of a larger list containing only the items specified by the pagination object.
